Barnaby Joyce

National Party Representative for New England since September 2013

Speeches in Parliament

Share

Before being National Party Representative for New England, Barnaby Joyce was National Party Senator for Queensland.

How do they vote?

Please note that our voting records start in 2006.

Rebel votes

Possible Friends

Shows which people voted most similarly to Barnaby Joyce in Parliament. This is measured from 0% agreement (never voted the same) to 100% (always voted the same). Only votes that both attended are counted. This may reveal relationships between people that were previously unsuspected. Or it may be nonsense.

They Vote For You

A site dedicated to making parliamentary voting information accessible, understandable, and easy to use so that you can hold your elected representatives to account.
